short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turning financial devastation into Prog Rock magic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension replaces online instances of the doomed multinational facilities management and construction services company, Carillion, with the name of Britain's greatest neo-prog outfit, Marillion. Sorry.
